content: when the weather calls for extreme warmth look no further than this toasty knit hat designed for him we used a warm shade of patons classic wool worsted to showcase a densely cabled pattern with a generous ribbed brim worked in the round this pattern will keep you engaged with cables ribbing and decreases techniques it s a thoughtful gift for all the fashion-forward men on your list so make a few in colors to please them all yarn for model patons® classic wool worsted™ 3 5 oz/100 g 194 yds/177 m brown mustard 77757 2 balls materials sizes u s 6 4 mm and u s 7 4 5 mm circular knitting needles 16 40 5 cm long or sizes needed to obtain gauge set of 4 size u s 7 4 5 mm double-pointed knitting needles stitch marker yarn needle cable needle
